sentences.english: With logging results, they succeeded in dealing with the three salt wells.
sentences.chinese: 并根据测量结果成功地处理了三口盐井。

sentences.english: In the late Tang Dynasty, there were almost 640 salt wells in Jiannandao and Shannandao.
sentences.chinese: 唐朝末年，剑南道和山南道盐井数大约为640所。

sentences.english: Directional drilling technique of salt well is high-technique property, The connected wells has been used successfully in 417 Team.
sentences.chinese: 盐井定向钻探施工产业，是一项科技含量较高的产业。
